source_info.note: Multiple conflicting sources for opening hours and some manager names; primary source is Powerleague official website and Playtomic booking platform; Processed by extraction on 2025-11-25 12:55:55

other_attributes.part_of_chain: Powerleague (41 locations across UK, Ireland and Netherlands)
other_attributes.original_configuration: 6 synthetic surface football pitches (2 seven-a-side, 4 five-a-side)
other_attributes.padel_court_type: Canopied / covered courts with clear glazed panels and mesh fencing
other_attributes.facilities: Changing rooms, shower facilities, lockers (30p token), common room, vending machines, snack bar, dining area, party rooms, function room (multi-purpose, available for hire), late license for events, WiFi, equipment rental, disabled access, CCTV
other_attributes.parking: Free parking available, limited spaces, best availability during day and before 5pm, weekends busy
other_attributes.public_transport: Bus routes 19, 26, N26, X26, 12, 21, 45, 49, 69, 15; Tram T50 line; King's Road bus stop 4 min walk (266m); Bridge Street bus stop 4 min walk; Journey time from Edinburgh city centre less than 20 minutes by bus
other_attributes.kids_activities: Birthday parties (football-themed), holiday camps (10am-3pm with early drop-off 8:30am, late pick-up 4pm), football coaching, age groups 3-15 years / 4-11 years, camp food option £5.95 per day (pizza or chicken nuggets, slush, crisps, sweet), bubble football
other_attributes.leagues_and_activities: 5-a-side leagues, 7-a-side leagues, Wednesday 5s League, walking football (mixed gender), veterans football, women's football, youth football, student football, corporate events, tournament hosting
other_attributes.booking_model: Pay and play (no membership required), block bookings available (average 10 weeks)
other_attributes.equipment_rental: Ball hire available (£10 refundable deposit), equipment rental for padel
other_attributes.staff: Club Manager: Nicola Brant / Daniel Brant (conflicting sources), coaches named Val, Ross, Jordan
other_attributes.historical_note: Site subject to council sale proposal (2017 petition to save facility)
other_attributes.opening_hours_conflicts: Multiple sources provide conflicting opening hours; Powerleague website and Playtomic show 09:00-22:30 most days, but other sources vary significantly
